flawed_nl_solution:
To get the perimeter, you add all the sides o the triangles, so the first two sides add up to 40+50 = <<40+50=70>>70 cm.
If the perimeter of the triangle is 160, the remaining side is 160-70 = <<160-70=90>>90 cm.
#### 90

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
